resources.string: A person who is qualified to treat diseases and other conditions that affect the teeth and gums.
A doctor who specializes in the study or treatment of heart diseases and heart abnormalities.
A doctor skilled in the treatment of diseases of women\'s the reproductive organs.
A medical practitioner specializing in the diagnosis and treatment of mental illness.
A person who uses X-rays or other high-energy radiation for treatment.
A specialist in the anatomy, functions, and organic disorders of the nervous system.
A medical practitioner qualified to diagnose and treat skin disorders.
A medical professionals who treat kidney problems and diseases.
A medical practitioner who treat disorders of the endocrine glands and hormones.
Please Long Press any Doctor Category to know more about it.
